snippet: Quirky state alcohol laws, a storied brewing culture and a patchwork of well-carved neighborhoods have created ideal conditions for start-up breweries in Denver.
abstract: Denver Journal; people are flocking to small breweries around Denver, where the combination of quirky state alcohol laws and a storied brewing culture has created ideal conditions for start-up breweries.
lead_paragraph: Quirky state alcohol laws, a storied brewing culture and a patchwork of well-carved neighborhoods have created ideal conditions for start-up breweries in Denver.

headline.main: Craft Brewing Finds a Welcoming Atmosphere
headline.print_headline: Craft Brewing Finds a Welcoming Atmosphere
